definition: The word "tyrannisch" refers to a behavior or attitude characterized by an excessive and oppressive exercise of power or authority. It is commonly used to describe individuals who exhibit dictatorial or authoritarian tendencies, often imposing their will on others without regard for their rights or well-being.

examples.german: Sie ertrug seinen tyrannischen Charakter nicht mehr.
examples.english: She couldn't bear his tyrannical nature anymore.

examples.german: Die tyrannische Regierung unterdrückte die Opposition.
examples.english: The tyrannical government suppressed the opposition.

examples.german: Er benutzte seine tyrannische Macht, um andere zu kontrollieren.
examples.english: He used his tyrannical power to control others.

examples.german: Die tyrannische Führung führte zu einem Aufstand.
examples.english: The tyrannical leadership led to a rebellion.
